title: Papa's Scooperia
description: Papa's Scooperia is a casual time management game where you embark on a journey to run your ice cream shop by taking, making, and serving orders. The restaurant can be slow but gets increasingly crowded as the days go by. The more crowded it gets, the greater the pressure becomes. Do a good job, and you won’t only earn the satisfaction of a hard day’s work, but you will also earn a winning in tips!
